document.title: Unemployment and Employment Programs Available to Workers from Alabama, Louisiana, and Mississippi Affected by Hurricane Katrina
document.abstract: This paper examines unemployment and employment programs available to workers affected by Hurricane Katrina in Alabama, Louisiana, and Mississippi.

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation
Whittaker, J.M. and Lordeman, A. (2005). Unemployment and Employment Programs Available to Workers from Alabama, Louisiana, and Mississippi Affected by Hurricane Katrina. (RL33084) Washington, DC: Congressional Research Service.
http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/key_workplace/267/

For additional information: DOL Natural Disaster Assistance Programs
